String.string: Small Niveot Chest of the Master Fusioneer
String.toolTip:
"Niveot is not a cream!"

Open this chest to obtain 1 Dyad Niveot Structure and 1 random fine niveot. Use the Dyad Niveot Structure together with 3 fine niveots to create 1 dyad niveot.

String.string: Medium Niveot Chest of the Master Fusioneer
String.toolTip:
"Niveot is not a cream!"

Open this chest to obtain 3 Dyad Niveot Structures and 2 random fine niveots. Use the Dyad Niveot Structure together with 3 fine niveots to create 1 dyad niveot.

String.string: Large Niveot Chest of the Master Fusioneer
String.toolTip:
"Niveot is not a cream!"

Open this chest to obtain 5 Dyad Niveot Structures and 3 random fine niveots. Use the Dyad Niveot Structure together with 3 fine niveots to create 1 dyad niveot.

Teleports you to the premium-only area in Velika. From there you can enter the Ghillieglade special dungeon.

In total each character can enter up to once per day. You can obtain valuable enchanting materials and Banyaka's Rootlocked Treasure in Ghillieglade.

- Note! -
Every time you teleport to the premium-only area it costs one scroll, even if you've already entered Ghillieglade the maximum number of times.

For TERA Club Members
As a member of the TERA Club you can enter up to twice per day with each character and can teleport to the premium-only area as often as you like via the club bar.

String.toolTip: As long as war and violence plague this land the monsters will return in their quest to bring about the end of the world.

Teleports you to the premium-only area in Velika. From there you can enter the Ghillieglade special dungeon.

In total each character can enter up to once per day. You can obtain valuable enchanting materials and Banyaka's Rootlocked Treasure in Ghillieglade.

- Note! -
Every time you teleport to the premium-only area it costs one scroll, even if you've already entered Ghillieglade the maximum number of times.

For TERA Club Members
As a member of the TERA Club you can enter up to twice per day with each character and can teleport to the premium-only area as often as you like via the club bar.
A nice bundle of experience for characters level 60 and up. Gives your character enough XP to reach level 61.
Increases your skill damage by 12.5% for 30 minutes.
Increases your skill damage by 12.5% for 30 minutes.
Increases power by $H_W_GOOD7$COLOR_END for 30 minutes. Cannot be used simultaneously with other Savage Draughts.
Increases power by $H_W_GOOD7$COLOR_END for 30 minutes. Cannot be used simultaneously with other Savage Draughts.
Increases endurance by $H_W_GOOD15$COLOR_END for 30 minutes. Cannot be used simultaneously with other Savage Draughts.
Increases endurance by $H_W_GOOD15$COLOR_END for 30 minutes. Cannot be used simultaneously with other Savage Draughts.
A scythe created in the shape of a phoenix's wings for fast attacks.
Surprise them with martial arts mastery out of the blue.

A headband with wings. "Fly and be free!"
Your angelic beneficence shines blue.
What better way to collect arkai eggs than to look like you belong in the nest?
For taking care of business...or at least the kitchen sink.
Able to puncture a hole in just about anything.
Ice your enemy with good humor.
Go berserk with fantasy moderator power!
Focus your inner rageor at least your inner childthrough this patchwork plush doll.
No spitballs required.
Make a clean sweep of your enemies and your hall.
"I can rescue my own damned self."

String.string: Smart Box: Glacial Silver Dragon Weapon Skin (7 Days)
String.toolTip:
Ice cold!'

A smart box with a 7-day Glacial Silver Dragon weapon skin. (Smart boxes automatically generate the corresponding equipment for your character when you open them. Cannot be used by Reapers.)

Ice cold!'

String.string: Small Niveot Chest of the Elegant Master Fusioneer
String.toolTip:
"Niveot is not a cream!"

Open this chest to obtain 1 Smart Dyad Niveot Structure and 1 random fine niveot. Use the Smart Dyad Niveot Structure together with 3 fine niveots to create 1 dyad niveot with at least one effect from the three sacrificed crystals.

String.string: Medium Niveot Chest of the Elegant Master Fusioneer
String.toolTip:
"Niveot is not a cream!"

Open this chest to obtain 3 Smart Dyad Niveot Structures and 2 random fine niveots. Use the Smart Dyad Niveot Structure together with 3 fine niveots to create 1 dyad niveot with at least one effect from the three sacrificed crystals.

String.string: Large Niveot Chest of the Elegant Master Fusioneer
String.toolTip:
"Niveot is not a cream!"

Open this chest to obtain 5 Smart Dyad Niveot Structures and 3 random fine niveots. Use the Smart Dyad Niveot Structure together with 3 fine niveots to create 1 dyad niveot with at least one effect from the three sacrificed crystals.

This item allows you to send a message (max. 50 characters) that is then visible to all players on your server in the chat window. Use the Megaphone by right-clicking on it directly in your inventory or select the Megaphone Channel (/m) in the chat window.

Is consumed upon use. Your message will be displayed in the chat for a few seconds or until another megaphone message is sent.
A wonderful Christmas Chest from Fat Santa.
A valuable Christmas Gift from Tiny Santa.

This fusion altar allows you to transform various items such as hats and costumes into special and rare items! The Tiny and Fat Santas have given you the same hat more than once? Then open fusion with a right-click and sacrifice the superfluous items to then have a chance at getting a gown!

This item is part of an event. Details on the potential results of fusion can be found on en.tera.gameforge.com

[Easter Event Item]
High-quality eggs may contain fabulous surprises! Right-click to transform the Easter Egg into a new egg. You receive one of the following items:

[On Success]
- Easter Egg II
- Easter Egg III
- Easter Egg IV

[On Failure]
- 1x Broken Eggshell

"Remember you can't make an omelet without breaking eggs!"

Right-click to receive a Mysterious Easter Treasure.

"Happy Easter!"

[Easter Event Item]
A gleaming runestone which shimmers in the spring sunlight. Whoever uses the stone to hide their best Easter gifts in the vicinity will receive a precious reward!

[Receive Reward]
- Right-click to transform the number of Magnificent Easter Gifts displayed into a Mysterious Easter Treasure. Details regarding the contents can be found at en.tera.gameforge.com
- Runestones can be obtained from the Vanguard Initiative Reputation Merchant or in the TERA Shop.
- Easter Eggs can be obtained in level 65+ instances or the TERA Shop.
Use this item to substantially increase your chances of success when enchanting for 5 minutes. Applies to items of all tiers, but only up to enchantment level +12.
Use this item to greatly increase your chances of success when enchanting for 5 minutes. Applies to items of all tiers, but only up to enchantment level +12.
Use this item to massively increase your chances of success when enchanting for 5 minutes. Applies to items of all tiers, but only up to enchantment level +12.

TERA Club members can collect this chest once per day. It contains various everyday items for Arboreas heroes. Right-click to open it and receive the following boosts:
- 2x Small Elinu's Tear
- 1x Bravery Potion
- 1x Canephora Potion
- 1x [Event] Small Comet
- 1x Summon NPC: Phargo
- 1x Summon NPC: Schwab
- 1x Summon NPC: Sionne
- 1x Summon NPC: Monti
2x Azart Elixir

TERA Club members can collect this chest once per day. It contains various everyday items for Arborea's heroes. Right-click to open it and receive the following boosts:
- 3x Vial of Elinu's Tears
- 1x Bravery Potion
- 1x Canephora Potion

A sole feather from a flying mount.

Combine it with a Flight Rune to create a flying mount of your choice. You can obtain Flight Runes in the TERA Shop or by trading with other players.
Can also be obtained by fusing together five Minuscule Wing Fragments looted from dungeons.

Sliver of a feather. Collect enough and combine them to form a Zephyrous Wing Fragment. Right-click to convert.

You can create flying mounts with a Zephyrous Wing Fragment!

A solitary hair, probably from the mane of a proud creature.

Can be used with a Flight Rune to create a flying lion. You can obtain Flight Runes in the TERA Shop or by trading with other players.

A robust-looking hoof. Who'd leave something like that lying around?

Can be used with a Flight Rune to create a flying pegasus. You can obtain Flight Runes in the TERA Shop or by trading with other players.

Use this rune to combine the materials necessary for the Flying Skill: Frostlion.

"When the Valkyon Federation heard of Dakuryon's monstrous experiments, we dispatched adventurers to stop him. Afterward it was decided that only officially tested runes should be used to provide creatures with the power of flight. Doing so by any other means is strictly prohibited!"

Use this rune to combine the materials necessary for the Flying Skill: White Pegasus.

"When the Valkyon Federation heard of Dakuryon's monstrous experiments, we dispatched adventurers to stop him. Afterward it was decided that only officially tested runes should be used to provide creatures with the power of flight. Doing so by any other means is strictly prohibited!"

Use this rune to combine the materials necessary for the Flying Skill: Winged Charger.

"When the Valkyon Federation heard of Dakuryon's monstrous experiments, we dispatched adventurers to stop him. Afterward it was decided that only officially tested runes should be used to provide creatures with the power of flight. Doing so by any other means is strictly prohibited!"

- Minuscule Wing Fragment
and many more consumables.

Wool as soft as the clouds youre flying through!

The crystalbind is destroyed when a crystal otherwise would have been destroyed. Lasts for 12 hours of gameplay, and supersedes the effect of Crystalbind when used together.
Use this scroll to change the enchantment effects of equipment. [Right-click scroll, then left-click target item.]
Contains a random amount of Veteran Masterwork Alkahest, plus either a random amount of Tier 9 Feedstock or a Minuscule Wing Fragment.
Contains a Veteran Semi-Enigmatic Scroll, plus a random number of Veteran Semi-Enigmatic Scrolls, Spellbind IXs, Noctenium Infusions, Goldfinger Tokens or a Minuscule Wing Fragment.
Contains a fixed number of Spellbind IXs, plus a random number of Spellbind IXs, Veteran Semi-Enigmatic Scrolls, Noctenium Infusions, Goldfinger Tokens or a Minuscule Wing Fragment.

The burning glow from the dragon's intensely hot flame will extinguish after a single day.

[For TERA Club members]
Transform Banyaka's Rootlocked Treasure into Banyaka's Treasure using this flame.

Banyaka's Treasure can be opened and contains great rewards!

One of Banyaka's treasure chests, kept under guard in the Ghillieglade. Locked tight by the closely bound roots, it cannot be opened in its current state.

[For TERA Club members]
Free the chest from the fettering roots with the Dragon's Flame and transform it into Banyaka's Treasure.

Banyaka's Treasure can be opened and contains great rewards!

The chest appears to be slightly singed, but otherwise intact. Right-click to open.

[For TERA Club members]
Banyaka's Rootlocked Treasure was salvaged from the Ghillieglade and transformed into this item with the aid of the Dragon's Flame.

Banyaka's Treasure can be opened and contains great rewards!

Right-click to receive a small summer gift.

"Is there anything more relaxing than lying on a beach and watching the sun go down?"

Right-click to receive a medium summer gift.

"When's the best time for a picnic at the beach? Why at night, of course, with the reflections of the stars shimmering on the gentle waves!"

String.string: Arcane Reliquary of the Golden Sun
String.toolTip:
Right-click to receive a large summer gift.

"The sun washes over the land, bathing it in golden rays. Kick back in the heat and enjoy a nice refreshing drink with your friends."

String.string: Arcane Reliquary of the Harvest Moon
String.toolTip:
Right-click to receive a mysterious summer gift.

"Time for a cooling dip. Into the water!"

A very special beverage for summer. Replenishes 15% of total HP on use.

"Aaah, that hit the spot!"

[Event Item]
A gleaming runestone which shimmers in the summer sunlight. Whoever uses the stone to give their most glorious seashell back to the sea will receive a precious reward!

[Receive Reward]
- Right-click to transform the number of Arcane Reliquarys of the Golden Sun displayed into a Arcane Reliquary of the Harvest Moon. Details regarding the contents can be found at en.tera.gameforge.com
- Runestones can be obtained from the Vanguard Initiative Reputation Merchant or in the TERA Shop.
- Seashells can be obtained in level 65+ instances or the TERA Shop.

Use this rune to combine the materials necessary for the Flying Skill: Spirit Dragon.

"When the Valkyon Federation heard of Dakuryon's monstrous experiments, we dispatched adventurers to stop him. Afterward it was decided that only officially tested runes should be used to provide creatures with the power of flight. Doing so by any other means is strictly prohibited!"

Use this rune to combine the materials necessary for the Flying Skill: Armored Dragon.

"When the Valkyon Federation heard of Dakuryon's monstrous experiments, we dispatched adventurers to stop him. Afterward it was decided that only officially tested runes should be used to provide creatures with the power of flight. Doing so by any other means is strictly prohibited!"

An echo of the most innerly essence of a majestic dragon from times long gone.

Can be used with a Flight Rune to create a flying Spirit Dragon. You can obtain Flight Runes in the TERA Shop or by trading with other players.

Unimpenetrable darkness, bound since the time of dragons, thousands of years ago.

Can be used with a Flight Rune to create a flying Armored Dragon. You can obtain Flight Runes in the TERA Shop or by trading with other players.

Hardened scales of a long extinct species.

Can be used with a Flight Rune to create a flying dragon. You can obtain Flight Runes in the TERA Shop or by trading with other players.

Darkan's Wings do not give you the ability to fly.

Congratulations! You're the first player of your class to reach level 65 on Manahan.
This prize is only available once per class. You can open this chest on the event server or on any other regular server.

Manahan was also the first of his kind. But don't follow this wayward god's example. Use your powers wisely!

Congratulations! You were part of the group which was first to complete one of the following 5 dungeons on Manahan:
- Sky Cruiser Endeavor
- Lilith's Keep (Hard)
- Thaumetal Refinery
- RK-9 Kennel
- RK-9 Kennel (Hard)

This prize is only available once per dungeon on Manahan. You can only open this chest on a regular server.

Manahan's incursions into the dream bring many dangers. But you and your allies are equal to the challenge!

Congratulations! You're ranked among the top 3 players on the battlegrounds this week.
- Corsairs' Stronghold
- Champions' Skyring
- Fraywind Canyon

This prize can be earned once per week. You can have up to 5 of these chests in your inventory. You can only open this chest on a regular server.

Your thirst for fame and fortune is reminiscent of Manahan's. Just remember high fliers have further to fall!

Congratulations! You've reached level 65.

You can open this chest on the event server or on any other regular server.

This is not the end of your fight against Manahan... it is just the beginning!

Congratulations! You have completed the following dungeons 5 times on the server Manahan:
- Sky Cruiser Endeavor
- Lilith's Keep (Hard)
- Thaumetal Refinery
- RK-9 Kennel
- RK-9 Kennel (Hard)

You can only have 1 of these chests in your inventory. You can only open this chest on a regular server.

Manahan's sinister creation, Shandra Manaya, fights unswervingly for her master's desires. Whose side are you fighting on?

Congratulations! You have been victorious on each of the following battlegrounds 10 times:
- Corsairs' Stronghold
- Champions' Skyring
- Fraywind Canyon

You can only have 1 of these chests in your inventory. You can only open this chest on a regular server.

Manahan's sinister machinations have already cost many lives. May your fighting spirit never cloud your judgment!

Congratulations! You have logged in 25 times during the event.

You can only have 1 of these chests in your inventory. You can only open this chest on a regular server.

His perpetual struggle not to be forgotten causes Manahan to intervene in our world time and again. Fortunately there are heroes such as yourself prepared to fight back his influence.

A reward for your unswerving dedication in Arborea more than 3 hours per day!

This prize can only be earned once per day. You can open this chest on the event server or on any other regular server.

Danger always hangs above the world the time for heroes is now!

A major boon to your endeavors. You receive this delivery each day upon logging in. You can open this chest on the event server or on any other regular server.

Every means is justified in the fight against evil!

You have achieved the highest rank of all players of your class in a battleground season! This achievement counts the total score of all currently ranked battlegrounds across all servers.
Completes the achievement Survival of the Fittest and grants you the title Annihilator.

You have achieved the highest rank of all players in a battleground season! This achievement counts the total score of all currently ranked battlegrounds across all servers.
Completes the achievement Resistance is Futile! and grants you the title Warlord.

You have achieved the highest rank of all players in three consecutive battleground seasons! This achievement counts the total score of all currently ranked battlegrounds across all servers.
Completes the achievement Cower, Mortals! and grants you the title God of the Battlefield.

Shrouds you in the sinister mists of ferocious battles.

Fragment of a Hoar Frost Orb, shattered into pieces by a sudden jolt.
Right-click to transform the listed number of Hoar Frost Shards into a Hoar Frost Orb.
You can earn Hoar Frost Shards from various events or purchase them in the TERA Shop.

Fragment of an Ember Flame Orb, shattered into pieces by a sudden jolt.
Right-click to transform the listed number of Ember Flame Shards into an Ember Flame Orb.
You can earn Ember Flame Shards from various events or purchase them in the TERA Shop.

Fragment of an Elemental Orb shattered by the volatile forces of fire and ice.
Using a fusion recipe and the equivalent quest, you can transform the listed number of Elemental Shards into an Ember Flame Orb or a Hoar Frost Orb.
You can earn Elemental Shards from various events. Fusion recipes can be acquired from Vanguard Initiative merchants.

An orb of solid magical ice which can be transformed into a special reward with a Hoar Frost Binder.
You can purchase Hoar Frost Binders from Vanguard Initiative merchants or in the TERA Shop.

An orb of glimmering magical fire which can be transformed into a special reward with an Ember Flame Binder.
You can purchase Ember Flame Binders from Vanguard Initiative merchants or in the TERA Shop.

A pulsating orb of magical elements.
Can be transformed into a Hoar Frost Orb or an Ember Flame Orb using a fusion recipe and the respective quest. Fusion recipes can be acquired from Vanguard Initiative merchants.

<font color = '#2478FF'>Quest item.</font> A recipe for fusing an Elemental Orb and magical fire. Right-click to start the quest.

Combines 5 Hoar Frost Orbs into a highly valuable reward for you.

Combines 5 Ember Flame Orbs into a highly valuable reward for you.

Uses mysterious powers to reduce your body temperature below freezing.
Increases your skill damage by 5% but reduces your movement speed by 10%. Also grants you a shield of ice which absorbs up to 75,000 damage. It costs 1 MP for every 200 points of damage absorbed.
Note: Cannot be used in combination with the skills Iron Will or Mana Barrier. If you use this potion at the same time as one of these skills, both effects will be canceled.

Note: Cannot be used in combination with the skills Iron Will or Mana Barrier. If you use this potion at the same time as one of these skills, both effects will be canceled.

The untamed flames bring your blood to boiling point.
Increases your attack speed by 5% but reduces your health by 75% and healing you receive by 85%.
Note: You will die if you use the potion when you have less than 75% of your max HP.

String.toolTip: A smart box containing permanent Dyeable General's Dress Uniform. [Smart boxes automatically generate the corresponding equipment for your character when you open them.]

[Batu Desert Event Item]
A finely crafted piece of stone, seemingly part of a broken statue. Maybe it can be repaired with enough pieces.

[Combine]
- Right-click to combine the amount shown into 2 Batu Effigies.

You can hold up to 50 Broken Effigies in your inventory.

[Batu Desert Event Item]
The Batu Effigy is a symbol of your victory over the monsters of the Batu Desert. Collect more and offer them to the gods using a sacrificial altar to receive a worthy reward.

[Rewards]
- Collect your free Sacrificial Altar of Bone from the TERA Shop and use it to combine 800 Batu Effigies into a rewards chest.
- Combine 300 Batu Effigies into a rewards chest using a Sacrificial Altar of Spirits from the TERA Shop.
- Combine 200 Batu Effigies into a rewards chest using a Sacrificial Altar of Visions from the TERA Shop.

You can hold up to 1,000 Batu Effigies in your inventory.

[Batu Desert Event Item]
An ancient and long-forgotten treasure that has lain undisturbed in the desert sands for centuries. In order to break the spell which has sealed the chest, you require an Eye of the Desert.

[Rewards]
- Requires an Eye of the Desert to open.
- Eyes of the Desert can be found in the TERA Shop or in various dungeons with item level 446 or above.

May contain one of the following items:
- Xermetal Rod V
- Angler's Whiskers IV
- Premium Trade Coupon
- Supercooled Liquid Mirage Chest
- Catmorph Fresh or Sporty Meowear
- Phoenix Skill: Ancient Mighty Flamewynder
- 1000x Golden Talent
- 250x Silver Talent
- Photonic Energy Chest
- 5x Diamond
and much more

[Batu Desert Event Item]
An altar with numerous small indentations. Whoever offers up the right sacrifice will be richly rewarded!

[Rewards]
- Right-click to combine 800 Batu Effigies into a Batu Bone Chest.
- You can collect a free Sacrificial Altar of Bone from the TERA Shop once per day.
- More Sacrificial Altars of Bone can be collected on rare occasions from Kelsaik and Kaprima in the Batu Desert.

[Batu Desert Event Item]
An altar with numerous small indentations. Whoever offers up the right sacrifice will be richly rewarded!

[Rewards]
- Right-click to combine 300 Batu Effigies into a Batu Spirit Chest.
- More Sacrificial Altars of Spirits can be purchased in the TERA Shop or collected on rare occasions from Kelsaik and Kaprima in the Batu Desert.

[Batu Desert Event Item]
An altar with numerous small indentations. Whoever offers up the right sacrifice will be richly rewarded!

[Rewards]
- Right-click to combine 200 Batu Effigies into a Batu Vision Chest.
- More Sacrificial Altars of Visions can be purchased in the TERA Shop or collected on rare occasions from Kelsaik and Kaprima in the Batu Desert.

[Batu Desert Event Item]
A chest provided to you for offering up 800 Batu Effigies as a sacrifice. Right-click to open and receive valuable rewards.

Contents:
- 5x Batu Medal

Also contains one of the following items:
- Up to 75x Silver Talent
- Up to 15x Precious Rare Metal
- Up to 75x Ruby
- Smart Dyad Niveot Structure
- Item XP +20% (2 Hours)
- 3x Strong Bravery Potion
- 3x Strong Canephora Potion
and much more

[Batu Desert Event Item]
A chest provided to you for offering up 300 Batu Effigies as a sacrifice. Right-click to open and receive valuable rewards.

Contents:
- 5x Batu Medal

Also contains one of the following items:
- Up to 200x Silver Talent
- Up to 150x Ruby
- 20x Trade Chest: Precious Rare Metal
- 1x [Event] Heroic Emblem
- Smart Dyad Niveot Structure
- 2x Item XP +20% (2 Hours)
- 100x Popo Bait
and much more

[Batu Desert Event Item]
A chest provided to you for offering up 200 Batu Effigies as a sacrifice. Right-click to open and receive valuable rewards.

Contents:
- 10x Batu Medal

Also contains one of the following items:
- Xermetal Rod V
- Angler's Whiskers IV
- 100x Angler Token
- Up to 250x Silver Talent
- Up to 200x Ruby
- 2x Diamond
- 2x Smart Dyad Niveot Structure
- 2x Item XP +30% (1 Day)
- 100x Popo Bait
and much more

[Batu Desert Event Item]
A golden stone which bears an uncanny resemblance to an eye.
The very desert itself observes the finder of this object through the eye, but brave adventurers can use its power to unlock the spell over the Treasure of the Dunes.

[Rewards]
- Opens a Treasure of the Dunes.
- Eyes of the Desert can be acquired in the TERA Shop or in various dungeons with item level 446 or above.

[Batu Desert Event Item]
Right-click to open the Batu Medal Shop.
Can be obtained from chests which were created by combining a certain number of Batu Effigies with Sacrificial Altars.

[Batu Desert Event Item]
This chest keeps the delicate liquid cool and safe. Right-click to receive a Liquid Mirage.

[Liquid Mirage]
- Right-click to increase your loot. If all party members benefit from the effect, the loot will be doubled.
- The potion remains in your inventory for the time displayed before disappearing.
- During this time you may use it without limit, for example to renew the effect if it has expired.

The effect only applies in the Batu Desert.

[Batu Desert Event Item]
A milky white liquid which makes you see double the loot! Whatever is doubled, stays doubled, but the potion only works under the hot desert sun.

[Increased Loot Chance]
- Right-click to increase your loot. If all party members benefit from the effect, the loot will be doubled.
- The potion remains in your inventory for the time displayed before disappearing.
- During this time you may use it without limit, for example to renew the effect if it has expired.

The effect only applies in the Batu Desert.

Right-click to open the chest and receive a complete Photon costume set.

Contents:
- Smart Box: Photon Suit
- Smart Box: Photon Weapon Skin
- Photon Accumulator Y

[Batu Desert Event Item]
Use this manual to learn how to summon a lioness with a movement speed of 290.

[Batu Desert Event Item]
The demigods of the fashion world will grant you one wish in exchange for this coupon.

Use this coupon to make an premium item which becomes bound to you when worn tradeable again:
- Unequip the item and place it in your inventory.
- Contact TERA Support on the website.
- The Support team will unbind the item from you and remove the coupon.
- You can unbind costumes, weapon skins and head/face/back decorations.

The coupon cannot be used for mounts, pets or equipment.

A coin which can be looted on the classic server. Take them with you to a regular server at the end of the Classic Event, right-click to open the Classic Thaler Shop and reap your rewards.

"Is there any currency more traditional than real silver coins?"

Right-click to the open the Gold Ducat Shop.

"Pure gold!"
Use this manual to learn how to summon a Legendary Bloom Tail with a movement speed of 280 which restores 0.5% of your max HP and MP every second.

Congratulations! You reached level 60 on the classic server. Right-click to receive your reward.

You can only open this chest on a regular server.

This chest can only be earned once per character.

Congratulations! You're the first player of your class to reach level 65 on the classic server.

You can only open this chest on a regular server.

Congratulations! You were member of a party which was the first to complete one of the following 5 dungeons on the classic server:
- Argon Corpus (Hard)
- Manaya's Core (Hard)
- Wonderholme (Hard)
- Rift's Edge (Hard)
- Kelsaik's Nest (20 players)

You can only open this chest on a regular server.

Congratulations! You completed the following dungeons 10 times on the classic server:
- Manaya's Core (Hard)
- Wonderholme (Hard)
- Rift's Edge (Hard)

You can only open this chest on a regular server.

This chest can only be earned once per character. You can only have 1 of these chests in your inventory.

Congratulations! You were victorious 10 times on each of the following battlegrounds on the classic server:
- Corsairs' Stronghold
- Champions' Skyring
- Fraywind Canyon

You can only open this chest on a regular server.

This chest can only be earned once per character. You can only have 1 of these chests in your inventory.

Congratulations! You are among the top 5 battleground players this season.

You can only open this chest on a regular server.

This prize can only be earned once per battleground and season. You can have up to 5 chests in your inventory.

Congratulations! You logged into the game on 30 days during the classic event.

You can only open this chest on a regular server.

This chest can only be earned once per character. You can only have 1 of these chests in your inventory.

A reward for your unswerving dedication in Arborea more than 3 hours per day!

You can only open this chest on the classic server. This chest can only be earned once per server.
A major boon to your endeavors. You receive this delivery each day upon logging in. <font color = '#00A0FF'>You can only open this chest on the classic server.</font>

Congratulations! You earned first place 10 times in the following dungeons:
- Crucible of Flame
- Sirjuka Gallery

You can only open this chest on a regular server.

You can earn this chest once per character. You can only have 1 of these chests in your inventory.

A medal for completing the dungeon <font color = '#00A0FF'>Manaya's Core (Hard)</font>. Collect the listed number of insignias and combine them into the <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Classic] Carnage Chest</font> using a <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Classic] Dungeon Insignia Fusion</font>.

A medal for completing the dungeon <font color = '#00A0FF'>Wonderholme (Hard)</font>. Collect the listed number of insignias and combine them into the <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Classic] Carnage Chest</font> using a <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Classic] Dungeon Insignia Fusion</font>.

A medal for completing the dungeon <font color = '#00A0FF'>Rift's Edge (Hard)</font>. Collect the listed number of insignias and combine them into the <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Classic] Carnage Chest</font> using a <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Classic] Dungeon Insignia Fusion</font>.

Awarded for reaching 1st rank in the Crucible of Flame and the Sirjuka Gallery. Right-click to transform the displayed number of insignias into the <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Classic] Championship Chest</font>. You can only receive this reward once.

A medal for victory on the battleground <font color = '#00A0FF'>Corsairs' Stronghold</font>. Collect the listed number of insignias and combine them into the <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Classic] Bloodlust Chest</font> using a <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Classic] Battleground Insignia Fusion</font>.

A medal for victory on the battleground <font color = '#00A0FF'>Champions' Skyring</font>. Collect the listed number of insignias and combine them into the <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Classic] Bloodlust Chest</font> using a <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Classic] Battleground Insignia Fusion</font>.

A medal for victory on the battleground <font color = '#00A0FF'>Fraywind Canyon</font>. Collect the listed number of insignias and combine them into the <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Classic] Bloodlust Chest</font> using a <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Classic] Battleground Insignia Fusion</font>.
Transform your dungeon insignias into the <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Classic] Carnage Chest</font>. You can only receive this reward once. You can only have 1 Carnage Chest in your inventory.
Transform your battleground insignias into the <font color = '#00A0FF'>[Classic] Bloodlust Chest</font>. You can only receive this reward once. You can only have 1 Bloodlust Chest in your inventory.
A decoration for completing the extreme dungeon <font color = '#00A0FF'>Wonderholme (Hard)</font>. Collect a total of 31 emblems and combine them to get an exclusive title!

A voucher which adds a character transfer to your account.

Right-click to credit your account. Once added, you can transfer a character of your choice from one server to another from the website en.tera.gameforge.com.

The voucher is consumed upon use.

[Easter Event Item]
A mysterious runestone which smells of hay and wet paint. Whoever fills the indentations with the right colored eggs will receive a precious reward!

[Receive Reward]

- Runestones can be obtained from the Vanguard Initiative Reputation Merchant or in the TERA Shop.
- Easter Eggs can be obtained in level 65+ instances or the TERA Shop.

A token as a reward for your hardworking endeavors in the Easter Event. You can acquire them from the gifts you get from combining Easter Eggs.

Right-click to exchange the tokens for valuable items.

Right-click to accept the quest "The Missing Ingredient".

Activate the quest, find the missing ingredient and earn a magnificent reward!

Right-click to accept the quest "You Have Talent".

Activate the quest and learn more about the talent system which enables you to improve and customize your skills!
The mysterious item is required for the quest "The Missing Ingredient". Return to Ackerly in Lumbertown to complete the quest and receive your reward.
This token is required for the quest "You Have Talent". Return to Renish in Highwatch to complete the quest and receive your reward.

Add 3 days of TERA Club Membership to your account. A full list of all benefits can be found on en.tera.gameforge.com

This item cannot be transferred between servers.

Increases your hunting XP reward by $value for $time.$BRThe effect is doubled and the XP gain increased by 400% when a Monthly Pass has been used.$BRThis time decreases even when you're offline.$BR$BROnly one Super Speed Potion can be effective at a time. String.string: Body Change Pill - Chest-Size Change (For 2013, 2014 Swimwear)
String.toolTip:
This item takes effect only when used in conjunction with Style items that read, "Big Breasts are available."

Can only be used for female characters.
The item's effect is canceled when you use the sex change service,
the race change service,
and/or the appearance service.

A pill that a Popori merchant brought in from a mysterious country in the East. It enlarges or reduces breast sizes when used by female characters.
Right-click to select and apply a desirable breast size for an unlimited time.

Changing your body image after using this item may cause anomalies in your character sprites, e.g., your body parts could show over your clothes in certain poses.

- Mag. Amplification
- Phys. Amplification

Combine the amount of silk shown to make a Darkcore Laundry Set which you can exchange for Darkcore Underwear with one of the following stats:
- Mag. Amplification
- Phys. Amplification
- Mag. Resistance
- Phys. Resistance
This laundry basket contains one of a range of stat-boosting sets of underwear. You receive Exodor, Riveran or Darkcore Underwear. The basket is also guaranteed to contain 2x Darkcore Silk.

Right-click to exchange this laundry set for Exodor Underwear with one of the following stats:
- Mag. Amplification
- Phys. Amplification
- Mag. Resistance
- Phys. Resistance

This tool can be used to pick apart older underwear at the seams and acquire Exodor Linen. It isnt very efficient, but its effective. Together, 3 lots of underwear will produce 2x Exodor Linen. You can collect this material to turn into Exodor Underwear.

The Seam Ripper can be used on any underwear from the laundry basket available in the Goldfinger Token shop.

Combine the amount of linen shown to make an Exodor Laundry Set which can be exchanged for Exodor Underwear with one of the following stats:
- Mag. Amplification
- Phys. Amplification
- Mag. Resistance
- Phys. Resistance
A material for upgrading Exodor Linen to Darkcore Silk. You also require a Spinning Wheel from the Goldfinger Token shop.
Right-click to combine the displayed amount of Darkyarn from the Tikat Shop plus Exodor Linen into Darkcore Silk. The silk can be collected and combined to create Darkcore Underwear.

A precious stone from the depths of the oceans. Exchange it for valuable items from Cetus the Coral Diver on Serpentis Isle.

The merchants move on after the Seashell Event.

Right-click to exchange for vellum which can add an option to your gear. The existing options remain unchanged.

Do you want the gift of the gab? Exchange this item for a Silverwing mount of your choice. Learn and use all 5 riding skills to receive the <font color = '#02a4dc'>Silver-Tongued</font> title.

This key opens a Divine Support Box, Shimmering Jewel Box, Ancient Seal Box, a Dark Shard Box or Arborean Crystal Box. Each box consumes one key when opened.

Strongbox Keys can be purchased in the TERA Shop. TERA Club members automatically receive 20 keys each month.

[Effect] Completely restores your HP and MP, increases your attack speed by $H_W_GOOD3$COLOR_END and your movement speed in combat by $H_W_GOOD5$COLOR_END.

$H_W_BADBlessing cooldown: 30 minutes$COLOR_END

String.string: High Elf Female Dyeable Clockwork Corset
String.toolTip: Steampunked. "Discover color."
Steampunked. "When it comes to selecting a color, we leave you to your own devices."
Steampunked. "The finest in chromadaptive gearwear."
Steampunked. "Your garb might be pure science, but its color should be pure art."
Steampunked. "Style that suits you like a well-oiled machine."
Steampunked. "A proper popori is never without his waistcoat."
Steampunked. "Some people are wound just a little too tight."
Steampunked. "Gear upwith science!"
Steampunked. A pair of cold-forged blades, suitable for a warrior. "You were steampunk before steampunk was cool."
Steampunked. A finely-engineered blade, powered by steam, and fit for a lancer. "Who's the mad one now?"
Steampunked. An expanding blade, suitable for a slayer. "Nothing is impossible with science at your disposal."
Steampunked. A thermodynamic broadaxe, suitable for a berserker. "No design is so perfect as to preclude the addition of steam."
Steampunked. A pain-storing disc, suitable for a sorcerer. "The most efficient means for moving heat from one surface to another."
Steampunked. A steam-driven bow, suitable for an archer. "What it lacks in draw, it makes up for in psi."
Steampunked. A thermologic staff, suitable for a priest. "One person's magic, another person's science."
Steampunked. A handy effervescing rod, suitable for a mystic. "Add a little hiss-kachunk-UMPH to your boom."

String.string: High Elf Female Dyeable Clockwork Corset
String.toolTip: Steampunked. "Discover color."
Steampunked. "When it comes to selecting a color, we leave you to your own devices."
Steampunked. "The finest in chromadaptive gearwear."
Steampunked. "Your garb might be pure science, but its color should be pure art."
Steampunked. "Style that suits you like a well-oiled machine."
Steampunked. "A proper popori is never without his waistcoat."
Steampunked. "Some people are wound just a little too tight."
Steampunked. "Gear upwith science!"
Steampunked. "It's what the aethernauts wear."
Steampunked. A pair of cold-forged blades, suitable for a warrior. "You were steampunk before steampunk was cool."
Steampunked. A finely-engineered blade, powered by steam, and fit for a lancer. "Who's the mad one now?"
Steampunked. An expanding blade, suitable for a slayer. "Nothing is impossible with science at your disposal."
Steampunked. A thermodynamic broadaxe, suitable for a berserker. "No design is so perfect as to preclude the addition of steam."
Steampunked. A pain-storing disc, suitable for a sorcerer. "The most efficient means for moving heat from one surface to another."
Steampunked. A steam-driven bow, suitable for an archer. "What it lacks in draw, it makes up for in psi."
Steampunked. A thermologic staff, suitable for a priest. "One person's magic, another person's science."
Steampunked. A handy effervescing rod, suitable for a mystic. "Add a little hiss-kachunk-UMPH to your boom."

String.string: Flying Skill: Ancient Mighty Armored Dragon

(This increase does not stack.)
